title: Pressure-swing absorption and desorption behaviours of ammonia in bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)amide salts
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00820K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Manabu Tokushige, Ryota Fujisawa, Junichi Ryu
The absorption and desorption behaviours of NH3 in bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)amide (TFSA) salts were investigated using the pressure-swing method.
